alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:33AM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 5500 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...For the first Winter Storm Warning above 5500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the second Winter Storm Warning above 5500 feet, Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...For the first Winter Storm Warning, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the second Winter Storm Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 5 PM Today: Jacob Lake 6 to 8 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
